title: Three Fingers - $33 each finger - Sale Pending
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Three Fingers - $33 each finger - Sale Pending
posts.post_content:
Yup, that's the price for Three Finger Brown with an Hassan reverse in an SGC 35 holder.

For consistency let's throw in $3 for shipping for a grand total of $102, as it wouldn't be right to let this one go as a two digit sale.:D 

Please note as well that I will not split hairs or fingers in this sale.  The fingers are only available as a threesome. :eek:

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/24176/brown-hassan[/IMG]
Frank, you are hilarious. Every post of yours is a classic!
